00018 btCylinderShape::btCylinderShape (const btVector3& halfExtents)
00019 :btConvexInternalShape(),
00020 m_upAxis(1)
00021 {
00022         btVector3 margin(getMargin(),getMargin(),getMargin());
00023         m_implicitShapeDimensions = (halfExtents * m_localScaling) - margin;
00024 
00025         setSafeMargin(halfExtents);
00026 
00027         m_shapeType = CYLINDER_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE;
00028 }

00046 void btCylinderShape::getAabb(const btTransform& t,btVector3& aabbMin,btVector3& aabbMax) const
00047 {
00048         btTransformAabb(getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin(),getMargin(),t,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void    btCylinderShape::calculateLocalInertia(btScalar mass,btVector3& inertia) const
00052 {
00053 
00054 //Until Bullet 2.77 a box approximation was used, so uncomment this if you need backwards compatibility
00055 //#define USE_BOX_INERTIA_APPROXIMATION 1
00056 #ifndef USE_BOX_INERTIA_APPROXIMATION
00057 
00058         /*
00059         cylinder is defined as following:
00060         *
00061         * - principle axis aligned along y by default, radius in x, z-value not used
00062         * - for btCylinderShapeX: principle axis aligned along x, radius in y direction, z-value not used
00063         * - for btCylinderShapeZ: principle axis aligned along z, radius in x direction, y-value not used
00064         *
00065         */
00066 
00067         btScalar radius2;       // square of cylinder radius
00068         btScalar height2;       // square of cylinder height
00069         btVector3 halfExtents = getHalfExtentsWithMargin();     // get cylinder dimension
00070         btScalar div12 = mass / 12.f;
00071         btScalar div4 = mass / 4.f;
00072         btScalar div2 = mass / 2.f;
00073         int idxRadius, idxHeight;
00074 
00075         switch (m_upAxis)       // get indices of radius and height of cylinder
00076         {
00077                 case 0:         // cylinder is aligned along x
00078                         idxRadius = 1;
00079                         idxHeight = 0;
00080                         break;
00081                 case 2:         // cylinder is aligned along z
00082                         idxRadius = 0;
00083                         idxHeight = 2;
00084                         break;
00085                 default:        // cylinder is aligned along y
00086                         idxRadius = 0;
00087                         idxHeight = 1;
00088         }
00089 
00090         // calculate squares
00091         radius2 = halfExtents[idxRadius] * halfExtents[idxRadius];
00092         height2 = btScalar(4.) * halfExtents[idxHeight] * halfExtents[idxHeight];
00093 
00094         // calculate tensor terms
00095         btScalar t1 = div12 * height2 + div4 * radius2;
00096         btScalar t2 = div2 * radius2;
00097 
00098         switch (m_upAxis)       // set diagonal elements of inertia tensor
00099         {
00100                 case 0:         // cylinder is aligned along x
00101                         inertia.setValue(t2,t1,t1);
00102                         break;
00103                 case 2:         // cylinder is aligned along z
00104                         inertia.setValue(t1,t1,t2);
00105                         break;
00106                 default:        // cylinder is aligned along y
00107                         inertia.setValue(t1,t2,t1);
00108         }
00109 #else //USE_BOX_INERTIA_APPROXIMATION
00110         //approximation of box shape
00111         btVector3 halfExtents = getHalfExtentsWithMargin();
00112 
00113         btScalar lx=btScalar(2.)*(halfExtents.x());
00114         btScalar ly=btScalar(2.)*(halfExtents.y());
00115         btScalar lz=btScalar(2.)*(halfExtents.z());
00116 
00117         inertia.setValue(mass/(btScalar(12.0)) * (ly*ly + lz*lz),
00118                                         mass/(btScalar(12.0)) * (lx*lx + lz*lz),
00119                                         mass/(btScalar(12.0)) * (lx*lx + ly*ly));
00120 #endif //USE_BOX_INERTIA_APPROXIMATION
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE btVector3 CylinderLocalSupportX(const btVector3& halfExtents,const btVector3& v) 
00125 {
00126 const int cylinderUpAxis = 0;
00127 const int XX = 1;
00128 const int YY = 0;
00129 const int ZZ = 2;
00130 
00131         //mapping depends on how cylinder local orientation is
00132         // extents of the cylinder is: X,Y is for radius, and Z for height
00133 
00134 
00135         btScalar radius = halfExtents[XX];
00136         btScalar halfHeight = halfExtents[cylinderUpAxis];
00137 
00138 
00139     btVector3 tmp;
00140         btScalar d ;
00141 
00142     btScalar s = btSqrt(v[XX] * v[XX] + v[ZZ] * v[ZZ]);
00143     if (s != btScalar(0.0))
00144         {
00145         d = radius / s;  
00146                 tmp[XX] = v[XX] * d;
00147                 tmp[YY] = v[YY] < 0.0 ? -halfHeight : halfHeight;
00148                 tmp[ZZ] = v[ZZ] * d;
00149                 return tmp;
00150         }
00151     else
00152         {
00153             tmp[XX] = radius;
00154                 tmp[YY] = v[YY] < 0.0 ? -halfHeight : halfHeight;
00155                 tmp[ZZ] = btScalar(0.0);
00156                 return tmp;
00157     }
00158 
00159 
00160 }
00161 
00162 
00163

00167 inline  btVector3 CylinderLocalSupportY(const btVector3& halfExtents,const btVector3& v) 
00168 {
00169 
00170 const int cylinderUpAxis = 1;
00171 const int XX = 0;
00172 const int YY = 1;
00173 const int ZZ = 2;
00174 
00175 
00176         btScalar radius = halfExtents[XX];
00177         btScalar halfHeight = halfExtents[cylinderUpAxis];
00178 
00179 
00180     btVector3 tmp;
00181         btScalar d ;
00182 
00183     btScalar s = btSqrt(v[XX] * v[XX] + v[ZZ] * v[ZZ]);
00184     if (s != btScalar(0.0))
00185         {
00186         d = radius / s;  
00187                 tmp[XX] = v[XX] * d;
00188                 tmp[YY] = v[YY] < 0.0 ? -halfHeight : halfHeight;
00189                 tmp[ZZ] = v[ZZ] * d;
00190                 return tmp;
00191         }
00192     else
00193         {
00194             tmp[XX] = radius;
00195                 tmp[YY] = v[YY] < 0.0 ? -halfHeight : halfHeight;
00196                 tmp[ZZ] = btScalar(0.0);
00197                 return tmp;
00198     }
00199 
00200 }
00201 
00202 inline btVector3 CylinderLocalSupportZ(const btVector3& halfExtents,const btVector3& v) 
00203 {
00204 const int cylinderUpAxis = 2;
00205 const int XX = 0;
00206 const int YY = 2;
00207 const int ZZ = 1;
00208 
00209         //mapping depends on how cylinder local orientation is
00210         // extents of the cylinder is: X,Y is for radius, and Z for height
00211 
00212 
00213         btScalar radius = halfExtents[XX];
00214         btScalar halfHeight = halfExtents[cylinderUpAxis];
00215 
00216 
00217     btVector3 tmp;
00218         btScalar d ;
00219 
00220     btScalar s = btSqrt(v[XX] * v[XX] + v[ZZ] * v[ZZ]);
00221     if (s != btScalar(0.0))
00222         {
00223         d = radius / s;  
00224                 tmp[XX] = v[XX] * d;
00225                 tmp[YY] = v[YY] < 0.0 ? -halfHeight : halfHeight;
00226                 tmp[ZZ] = v[ZZ] * d;
00227                 return tmp;
00228         }
00229     else
00230         {
00231             tmp[XX] = radius;
00232                 tmp[YY] = v[YY] < 0.0 ? -halfHeight : halfHeight;
00233                 tmp[ZZ] = btScalar(0.0);
00234                 return tmp;
00235     }
00236 
00237 
00238 }

00240 btVector3       btCylinderShapeX::localGetSupportingVertexWithoutMargin(const btVector3& vec)const
00241 {
00242         return CylinderLocalSupportX(getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin(),vec);

00255 void    btCylinderShape::batchedUnitVectorGetSupportingVertexWithoutMargin(const btVector3* vectors,btVector3* supportVerticesOut,int numVectors) const
00256 {
00257         for (int i=0;i<numVectors;i++)
00258         {
00259                 supportVerticesOut[i] = CylinderLocalSupportY(getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin(),vectors[i]);
00260         }
00261 }
